original_title: A Calculated Forecast Of Ultimate Doom / The Deliberate Evolution Of A War Zone
overview: Two Shows from Survival Research Laboratories: San Francisco, CA 1994 and Graz, Austria 1992. The Doom show was SRL's biggest show ever and the War Zone event resulted in a nation-wide defense alert in Austria.
title: A Calculated Forecast Of Ultimate Doom / The Deliberate Evolution Of A War Zone
